description: Conducting research using satellite imagery, transfer learning, and inference to detect and analyze ecological richness changes in agricultural field boundaries in Canada.​
Tools and technologies: Google Earth Engine, TensorFlow, Python, Gitlab, Colab.
Contributing to Mindwaves V3 using Google Cloud Functions, Flutter, and optimized AI API interactions through prompt engineering.​
Maintaining Lintum and LegalTegrity projects, serving over 500 clients, using Springboot, Vue, Hasura, Graphql, and Gitlab pipelines.
Developed a pdf handling library from scratch that includes new features like adding spot colors and 3D rendering using Vue.js and TypeScript hosted with Gitlab pipeline in Firebase.
Migrated Doranco LMS, used by more than 5000 users, from Symfony version 3.4 to 5.4 (updating old bundles) and using twig, jQuery and Bootstrap to boost the performance of the system by 300%.​
Developed Okalee LMS, a multi-tenant software, using React, TypeScript, and Symfony sold for 20 clients.
